title: 4 Pieces Carbon Fiber Parting Rat Tail Comb Cutting Comb Set, Includes Stainless Steel Pintail Comb Teasing Comb, Fine and Wide Tooth Comb Heat Hairdressing Comb for Braids Hair Salon Home
features: Lightweight and comfortable: the rat tail comb measures approx. 8.6 x 1.1 inches, the fine and wide tooth comb is approx. 8.9 x 1.2 inches, proper size for you to use at home or hair salons, lightweight and good for family and travel use, easy to carry or put in your pocket or bag

Useful design: the teeth of these carbon fiber cutting combs are dense at the front while sparse at the bottom, practical for you to use, non-slip design make it not easy to fall off from your hand, good for hair styling, parting, back combing, post styling and hair coloring

Firm and reliable: both the teasing combs and fine and wide tooth combs are made of carbon fiber material, the handles of teasing combs are made of stainless steel, durable and stable, not easy to break, can avoid pulling, tangling or damaging the hair, can help to massage your scalp and balance the oil, safe to use and won't scratch your scalp or pull your hair

Wide usages: these stainless steel pintail combs and heat resistant hairdressing combs are applicable for most hair types, such as straight, wet and curly hair, flexible enough to keep your hair smooth, the pointed and nonslip handle of pintail comb is suitable for dividing the hairline, curling, parting or lining, which helps you take care of the hair during styling

Package include: this package contains 2 pieces rat tail combs and 2 pieces fine and wide tooth combs, designed in black and pink colors, each color accounts for 2 pieces, enough for your daily hair styling needs, with moderate thickness, comfortable to use, not easy to break
description: Features:  Gentle and comfortable to use: The fine and wide teeth of heat resistant hairdressing combs are smooth and gentle on the scalp, can help to remove knots and tangles from your hair, proper for combing various volumes of hair.  Practical gifts: The combination of stainless steel pintail combs and fine and wide tooth comb allows you to do the daily hair styling at home, no need to go out to the hair salon, save your time and energy, sweet gifts for families, friends and yourself.  Specification: Material: carbon fiber, stainless steel Color: black Quantity: 4 pieces  Package contents: 2 x Stainless steel pintail comb 2 x Fine and wide tooth comb  Note: The words on the product are not for trademark, our trademark is Patelai.
